item.title: 瀚亞称美联储降息押注增强新兴市场吸引力
item.description: 瀚亚投资（Eastspring Investments）驻新加坡的投资组合经理纳文-辛格拉尼（Navin Hingorani）表示，美国即将降息的前景，加上当地通胀放缓和相对较低的公共债务，增强了新兴市场的投资吸引力。【原文：Emerging markets are becoming more attractive as the prospect of an upcoming US rate cut — combined with softer local inflation and relatively low public debt — strengthens the investment case, according to Navin Hingorani, Singapore-based portfolio manager at Eastspring Investments.】

item.title: 加州最大的内陆输油管道即将关闭，影响向湾区炼油厂的运输
item.description: 如果州政府不批准提高费率和采取其他措施，加州最大的内陆输油管道有可能在几个月内关闭，关闭后将切断至少两家旧金山地区炼油厂的部分原油供应。【原文：California’s largest inland oil pipeline is in danger of closing within months without state approval for a rate increase and other measures, a shutdown that would choke off some crude supplies to at least two San Francisco-area refiners.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴在 2025 年最大规模可转换债券发行中募集 31.7 亿美元
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）正寻求通过发行零息可转换债券融资 31.7 亿美元，这将是今年最大的一笔融资。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. is seeking to raise $3.17 billion in an offering of zero-coupon convertible notes that’s set to be the year’s biggest.】

item.title: 颜料制造商 Tronox 因业绩疲软考虑出售垃圾债券
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is speaking to investors regarding a possible junk-bond sale for Tronox Holdings Plc as the titanium-dioxide maker deals with weakened financial results.】

item.title: 日本央行观察家预计 1 月加息，36% 的人认为 10 月加息
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，大多数日本央行观察人士预计日本央行将在1月份之前提高基准利率，而在首相石破茂辞职加剧了政治不确定性之后，选择下个月作为可能时机的比例逐渐下降。【原文：Most Bank of Japan watchers expect authorities to lift the benchmark interest rate by January, with the proportion picking next month as the likely timing edging down after Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s resignation amplified political uncertainty, according to a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会即将就双股级基金做出决定
item.description: 据美国证券交易委员会投资管理部助理主任凯特琳-博托克（Kaitlin Bottock）称，美国证券交易委员会即将就资产管理公司是否可以将 ETF 作为共同基金的份额类别做出决定。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission is getting closer to making a decision about whether asset managers can offer ETFs as share classes of mutual funds, according to Kaitlin Bottock, assistant director at the regulator’s division of investment management.】

item.title: 玻利维亚为未来黄金交付筹集 5.89 亿美元资金
item.description: 美元匮乏的玻利维亚正依靠日益复杂的操作来筹集硬通货，用于偿还外债。【原文：Dollar-strapped Bolivia is relying on increasingly sophisticated operations to raise hard currency that it can use to pay its foreign debt.】

item.title: Blackstone 将从网上银行购买约 8.7 亿美元贷款
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 同意从 First Internet Bancorp 的一个部门购买多达 8.69 亿美元的商业房地产贷款，称为单一租户租赁融资。【原文：Blackstone Inc. agreed to buy as much as $869 million of commercial real estate loans known as single-tenant lease financing from a unit of First Internet Bancorp.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚筹集 90 亿美元抵押品以确保互换交易安全
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，哥伦比亚完成了约 93 亿美元资产的购买，作为一系列复杂掉期交易的抵押品。【原文：Colombia concluded the purchase of some $9.3 billion in assets to serve as collateral for a series of complex swap transactions, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: CVS 旗下 Omnicare 向 Alvarez & Marsal 寻求运营帮助
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Omnicare 公司正在与 Alvarez & Marsal 公司合作，以帮助其解决现金流和运营问题，此前这家药房服务提供商及其母公司 CVS Health 因一起药物欺诈诉讼案被勒令支付 9.49 亿美元。【原文：Omnicare Inc. is working with Alvarez & Marsal Inc. for help with its cash flow and operations after the pharmacy-services provider and its parent CVS Health were ordered to pay $949 million related to a drug-fraud suit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 大银行几乎被国债 10 年期拍卖拒之门外
item.description: 华尔街债券交易商周三比以往任何时候都更接近于错过财政部每月一次的 10 年期债券拍卖，这标志着这一新兴市场的参与率正在稳步下降。【原文：Wall Street bond dealers came closer than ever Wednesday to missing out on the Treasury Department’s monthly auction of 10-year notes, marking a steady decline in participation rates in the burgeoning market.】

item.title: 西班牙议会阻止缩短工作周，桑切斯受到打击
item.description: 西班牙议会投票否决了首相佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）关于缩短每周工作时间的提议，这是他领导的苦苦挣扎的少数派政府遭遇的最新挫折。【原文：The Spanish Parliament voted down Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez’s proposal to reduce the working week in the latest setback to his struggling minority government.】

item.title: 康涅狄格州的 "债务节食 "取得成效，两次提升债券评级

item.title: 布宜诺斯艾利斯投票前阿根廷通胀低于预期
item.description: 由于布宜诺斯艾利斯省的一次关键投票引发了货币波动，阿根廷的月度通货膨胀率攀升幅度低于预期。【原文：Argentina’s monthly inflation climbed less than expected as a crucial vote in Buenos Aires province had stirred up currency volatility.】

item.title: 调查显示，股市将战胜风险，在年底实现上涨
item.description: 根据最新的《市场脉搏》（Markets Pulse）调查显示，股市将摆脱通胀风险和就业前景疲软的影响，在今年年底高歌猛进。【原文：Stocks will brush off inflation risks and a weaker jobs outlook to end the year on a high note, according to the latest Markets Pulse survey.】

item.title: 看涨甲骨文期权持有者有望获得 15 亿美元意外之财
item.description: 在甲骨文公司因云计算业务需求强劲而股价飙升之后，持有押注甲骨文公司反弹期权的投资者的持股价值跃升了约 15 亿美元。【原文：Investors who owned options betting on a rally in Oracle Corp. saw the value of their holdings jump by around $1.5 billion after the software maker’s stock soared on strong demand for its cloud computing business.】

item.title: 德州仪器首席执行官认为数据中心市场 "增长强劲

Chief Executive Officer Haviv Ilan said the company’s data center business is helping fuel a recovery in demand, with revenue in that area growing at a pace above 50%.】

item.title: 蓝猫鸮即将完成 27 亿美元的二次股权出售
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Blue Owl Capital Inc. 即将完成对之前旗舰基金的二次交易，收集 27 亿美元的债务和股权。【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. is approaching the close of a secondary transaction for a prior flagship fund, collecting $2.7 billion in debt and equity, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 纽约轮渡乘客人数创历史新高，该系统计划开辟新航线
item.description: 纽约市轮渡系统上个月的乘客量创下历史新高，该系统希望加强美国最大的乘客专用轮渡网络的航线。【原文：New York City’s ferry system saw record ridership last month as it looks to bolster routes on the largest passenger-only ferry network in the US.】

item.title: 政策猜测引发需求担忧，美国生物燃料股受冲击
item.description: 由于担心特朗普政府的政策可能无法完全抵消要求炼油厂在汽油和柴油中掺入可再生燃料的豁免规定，美国生物燃料公司股价下滑。【原文：Shares of US biofuel companies slumped on fears that Trump administration policies may fall short of fully offsetting exemptions from mandates requiring refineries to blend renewable fuels into gasoline and diesel.】

item.title: Blackstone 和 Ares 提供 36 亿美元用于收购 Park Place

item.title: 从四张图表看甲骨文人工智能推动股市飞跃的意义
